channel.title: Noclip still in client?
channel.description: Is the ::noclip command still located in the newer runescape clients?

item.title: Noclip still in client?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

Zachera, that’s because the 317 servers are a pathetic, easily hacked disgrase to mankind. I strongly doubt it would be possible on the real rs servers.

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip still in client?
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

I’m sure there’s a way to do noclip on clientside, but it’d be a hassle to go through.

I’ve noclipped on many 317 servers without getting blocked. You’d probably have to change the command, but I’m sure if you put your head into it, you’d get through and noclip into a wall.

I wonder what Jagex’s reaction would be… lol.

NEW CLIENT!!! MORE OBFUSCATION!!! MORE PROTECTION!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip still in client?

item.description:
@Martin wrote:

It IS all server side, I am 99% sure that you could not no-clip in normal runescape with that command(unless your admin).
